data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Long, Jian-Kun, Yang, Lin, Chen, Xiang-Sheng (2015): A review of Chinese tribe Achilini (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Achilidae), with descriptions of Paracatonidia webbeda gen. & sp. nov. Zootaxa 4052 (2): 180-186, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4052.2.2
